body.p:
97
Oct. 5th 3
Col. Ira Stout.
Troy -- Indiana,
Colonel,

Your favor to the Governor of the 2nd Inst. has been referred to this office, and I hasten to reply that no authority exists for such appointment as you ask. While it might be beneficial to have such agent -- collecting and preserving Government property -- No orders from the War Department -- no law of this State, will justify us in issuing such commision.

Respectfully,
Your obt servt,
John Boyle
Adjt. Gen of Ky.
